sections.title: Recruitment
sections.subtitle: We specialize in helping individuals residing in Japan find suitable job opportunities.

services.title: Job Placement Assistance
services.description: We specialize in helping individuals residing in Japan find suitable job opportunities. Our team works closely with employers to match candidates with positions that align with their skills and career goals.

services.title: Support for Nepali Graduates
services.description: We are dedicated to assisting Nepali individuals holding a bachelorâ€™s degree who aspire to work in Japan.

services.title: Personalized Career Counseling
services.description: Our experienced counselors offer personalized career advice and support, helping candidates understand the job market, refine their resumes, and prepare for interviews.

services.title: Employer Partnerships
services.description: We have established strong partnerships with employers across industries in Japan, allowing us to offer candidates exclusive job opportunities.

sections.title: SSW
sections.subtitle: Comprehensive support for SSW visa applicants and employers in Japan.

services.title: Comprehensive Support for SSW (i) and SSW (ii)
services.description: We assist foreign nationals in obtaining both SSW (i) and SSW (ii) visas, ensuring they meet all requirements and pass necessary exams.

services.title: Industry-Specific Expertise
services.description: Our company specializes in placing workers in industries designated for SSW (i) and advanced sectors for SSW (ii).

services.title: End-to-End Recruitment Services
services.description: From application to placement, we provide full support, including language training and cultural orientation.

services.title: Family Support for SSW (ii) Holders
services.description: For SSW (ii) visa holders, we offer assistance with family relocation and integration, ensuring a smooth transition to life in Japan.
